description: Returns an OpenSearch Serverless access policy. For more information, see Data access control for Amazon OpenSearch Serverless.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Tye type of policy. Currently, the only supported value is data.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the access policy.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyDetail
nested_items.description: Details about the requested access policy.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The JSON policy document without any whitespaces.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date the policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the policy was last modified.
